trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties that manage the major and minor grids of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于管理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 对象的主要和次要网格的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality for the grids on the chart, and is exposed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MajorGrid%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MinorGrid%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供用于在该图中，网格的功能，并使用公开<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MajorGrid%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MinorGrid%2A>的每个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象。

trans-unit.source: Major grid lines by default do not have their <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的主要网格线没有其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性集。

trans-unit.source: When these properties for major grid lines are not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control determines the appropriate values for grid lines automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置这些属性主要网格线，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件自动确定网格线的相应值。

trans-unit.source: The axis and its minor grid lines by default have their <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties set to **Auto** (0).
trans-unit.target: 轴和默认情况下的其次要网格线具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性设置为**自动**(0)。

trans-unit.source: If axis labels or minor grid lines are enabled and these properties are not modified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control automatically determines how often to draw the minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了轴标签或次要网格线，并且不会修改这些属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件自动确定通常绘制次要网格线的方式。

trans-unit.source: Axis grids:
trans-unit.target: 轴网格：

trans-unit.source: Can be enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 可以启用或禁用。

trans-unit.source: Have a starting point that determines where they are first drawn.
trans-unit.target: 具有的起始点，确定首先绘制它们的位置。

trans-unit.source: Display lines that can be set for style, width and color.
trans-unit.target: 显示可以为样式、 宽度和颜色设置的行。

trans-unit.source: Can have either automatic intervals, or intervals that are set manually.
trans-unit.target: 可以自动时间间隔或手动设置的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether major or minor grid lines are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否启用主要或次要网格线。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if enabled, <see langword="false" /> if disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用，则为 <see langword="True" />；如果已禁用，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for major grid objects and <see langword="false" /> for minor grid objects.
trans-unit.target: 对于主要网格对象，默认值为 <see langword="true" />，对于次要网格对象，默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Major and minor grids are visible when enabled, and not visible when disabled.
trans-unit.target: 主要和次要网格可见时启用，且禁用时不可见。

trans-unit.source: Tick marks will not be displayed if disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用，则将不显示刻度线。

trans-unit.source: You can disable tick marks by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMarkStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置禁用刻度线<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMarkStyle.None>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval between major or minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线之间的间隔。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the interval between grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，该值表示网格线之间的间隔。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is not set (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) for major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值 (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />)。

trans-unit.source: For minor grid lines, the default value is zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 对于次要网格线，默认值为零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet> at design time, or by assigning a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object to which the chart element, such as a grid line or tick mark, belongs.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此 — 通过默认情况下，通过显式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet>在设计时，或通过分配的值<xref:System.Double.NaN>在运行时-此属性的实际值由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象图表元素，如网格线或刻度线标记所属。

trans-unit.source: The interval of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔永远不会受<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The interval is measured in axis units, and determines how often an applicable chart element is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 间隔的单位为轴单位并确定何种频率绘制适用的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a column chart has an X axis step of 1 (that is, 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth); if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Interval%2A> property for the X axis to 2, an axis label will be displayed for every other column.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个柱形图有 1 的 X 轴步骤 （即，1、 2、 3、 4 和等）;如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Interval%2A>属性为 X 轴为 2，将为每个其他列显示轴标签。

trans-unit.source: The same holds true for all applicable chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有适用的图表元素也是如此。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if in the previous example strip lines were being used, with an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A> of 0.5, and their <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property was 2, a strip line would be displayed at 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，如果在上一示例条带行中使用了，与<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>为 0.5，且其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>属性为 2，条带线将显示在 0.5、 2.5、 4.5 和等等。

trans-unit.source: If you set a chart element `Interval` property to zero, an interval will be automatically determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置图表元素`Interval`为零的属性，一个时间间隔将自动由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格线的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the interval offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，该值表示间隔偏移量。

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set"at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element, such as a grid line or a tick mark, belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时显式指定"未设置"或将其分配的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet>在运行时-此属性的实际值由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象图表元素，如网格线或刻度线，属于。

trans-unit.source: The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 值永远不会影响的次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性设置定义的偏移量的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A> can be a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>可以能为负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval offset type of major and minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的间隔偏移量类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 枚举值，该值指示间隔类型。

trans-unit.source: By default it is not set for major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for minor grid lines is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 次要网格线的默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时显式指定"未设置"或将其分配的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet>在运行时-此属性的实际值由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象图表元素，如网格线或刻度，例如-所属。

trans-unit.source: The interval offset type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量的类型永远不会受<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: If this interval offset type is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> property will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时间间隔偏移量类型设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>、<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>将使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval type for major or minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线的间隔类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 枚举值，该值指示间隔类型。

trans-unit.source: By default it is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines, by using the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不对轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置该值，而是使用 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for minor tick marks and grid lines is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于次要刻度线和网格线，默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet> at run time— the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时，显式使用"未设置"或将其分配的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.NotSet>在运行时-此属性的实际值由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>对象的图表元素-如网格线或刻度，例如-所属。

trans-unit.source: The interval type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值永远不会影响的次要刻度线和网格线的间隔类型<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Interval types can be set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>; the type of interval then depends on either the X-values or Y-values of the plotted <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects, depending on which axis the applicable elements belong to.
trans-unit.target: 间隔类型可以将设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>; 间隔的类型则取决于的 X 值或 Y 值绘制的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>对象，具体取决于哪个轴适用元素属于。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> property for a value axis will only have an effect if the values of the data points are <xref:System.DateTime> or `double` values.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>值轴的属性仅会造成影响，如果数据点的值是<xref:System.DateTime>或`double`值。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> property of the plotted <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.Auto> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A>属性所绘制的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.Auto>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> property for a categorical axis will only have an effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A> property (or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> property, depending on the axis in question) of the plotted <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object is either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.Auto> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>类别轴的属性仅会造成影响，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A>属性，具体取决于涉及的轴) 所绘制的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>对象可以是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.Auto>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType.DateTime>.

trans-unit.source: Sunday is considered the first day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 星期日被视为一周的第一天。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of a grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格线颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineColor%2A> property is used to specify the color of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineColor%2A>属性用于指定主要和次要刻度线或网格的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of a grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格的线型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle.Solid" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle.Solid" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineDashStyle%2A> property can be used to specify the line style of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineDashStyle%2A>属性可以用于指定主要和次要刻度线或网格形式的线条样式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 行可以是实体、 线和等。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of major and minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的线条宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> that represents the line width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示线条宽度（以像素为单位）的 <see langword="integer" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1（一）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineWidth%2A> property can be used to specify the line width, in pixels, of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.LineWidth%2A>属性可以用于指定的线条宽度，以像素为单位的主要和次要刻度线或网格形式。
